sentences.sContent: Deer have been poached here for years.
sentences.sCn: 多年来这里一直有人偷偷地猎鹿。

synos.tran: 水煮；偷猎；窃取；把…踏成泥浆

words.tran: 非法狩猎；物色人才；漂洗；低温煮
把…踏成泥浆；非法猎取；漂洗；窃取（poach的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 水煮；偷猎；窃取；把…踏成泥浆
trans.tranOther: to illegally catch or shoot animals, birds, or fish, especially on private land without permission
